channel.title: Recruiting Acrylicx Team
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Acrylicx Private Server![/size]
Hey everyone, me and my friend Joe decided to start a 317, Delta server. It is all coded and edited to what we want. but we have some problems both me and Joe cant host the server because of our crap computers, so we are looking for a hoster which must be 24/7. All the first donations will be to you to buy a vps. we are also looking for one more person to help run the server and help moderate the forum. If you are interested in joining please fill out the app, or add me on msn to talk in more detail. [size=24pt][b] Application[/b][/size]
Name: Timezone: Position Applying for: (Hoster) (Server/Forum Moderator) Msn: Do you have a Mic? Anything else we should know:
we will have this thread up for 2 days. after that we will decide on who gets the two positions. My Msn: Boomage123@hotmail.com

Anything else we should know: I’ve owned four servers, have been a co owner on three, and adminintrator\moderator on well over 10+
